it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.server.controller

Class MatchHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.server.controller.MatchHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MatchHandlerObserver, MatchObserver, java.lang.Runnable

    public class MatchHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, MatchHandlerObserver, MatchObserver
    The is The Controller of the entire Gameplay, the server is the only one that makes decision about the match, this class has the references to every model object and uses the methods of it, it also decides the commands to send to the clients and handles the commands arrived by every client, an instance of MatchHandler exist for every Match created by the server
    Author:
    Mirko
